knimeNode.name: Workflow Service Output
knimeNode.shortDescription: Sends back data to an external KNIME workflow. For use in workflows that are called from other workflows.

fullDescription.intro: Sends a table or any other port object to a KNIME workflow that calls this workflow using the Subworkflow node.

ports.inPort: Output provided by this workflow to a workflow calling this workflow, e.g, using the Call Workflow Service node. The port can be configured to match the type of data that is to be sent to the calling workflow.
ports.outPort: This port outputs the node's input without changes, for further processing in the workflow.
